1 #include "coverage_path.h"
2 
8 double rotate (nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid& map)
9 {
10  // get angle
11  cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble angle;
12  if (rotater.call(angle) == false) {
13  ROS_INFO("Not rotating map!");
14  return 0.0;
15  }
16  double a = angle.response.value;
17 
18  ROS_DEBUG("Rotate map by %.2f...", a);
19 
20  // rotate origin
21  geometry_msgs::Pose origin_new;
22  origin_new.position.x = map.info.origin.position.x*cos(a) - map.info.origin.position.y*sin(a);
23  origin_new.position.y = map.info.origin.position.x*sin(a) + map.info.origin.position.y*cos(a);
24 
25  // create empty rotated map extra large
26  vector<vector<signed char>> rt;
27  for (int i=0; i<2*map.info.height; ++i) {
28  vector<signed char> row(2*map.info.width, 100);
29  rt.push_back(row);
30  }
31 
32  // rotate map
33  int i_new, j_new, width_new=0, height_new=0;
34  double x, y, x_new, y_new;
35  for (int i=0; i<map.info.height; ++i) {
36  for (int j=0; j<map.info.width; ++j) {
37  // rotate coordinates
38  x = double(j) * map.info.resolution + map.info.origin.position.x;
39  y = double(i) * map.info.resolution + map.info.origin.position.y;
40  x_new = x*cos(a) - y*sin(a);
41  y_new = x*sin(a) + y*cos(a);
42  j_new = int(round((x_new - origin_new.position.x) / map.info.resolution));
43  i_new = int(round((y_new - origin_new.position.y) / map.info.resolution));
44 
45  // skip negative indexes
46  if (i_new >= rt.size()) {
47  continue;
48  }
49  if (j_new >= rt[i_new].size()) {
50  continue;
51  }
52 
53  // assign grid cell value
54  rt[i_new][j_new] = map.data[i*map.info.width + j];
55 
56  // measure maximum required size
57  if (rt[i_new][j_new] == 0) {
58  if (i_new > height_new)
59  height_new = i_new;
60  if (j_new > width_new)
61  width_new = j_new;
62  }
63  }
64  }
65 
66  // truncate rotated map
67  rt.resize(height_new);
68  for (int i=0; i<rt.size(); ++i)
69  rt[i].resize(width_new);
70 
71  // collapse map to one dimensional vector
72  vector<signed char> rt_col;
73  for (int i=0; i<rt.size(); ++i) {
74  for (int j=0; j<rt[i].size(); ++j) {
75  rt_col.push_back(rt[i][j]);
76  }
77  }
78 
79  // assign map data
80  map.data = rt_col;
81 
82  // update meta data
83  map.info.map_load_time = Time::now();
84  map.info.width = width_new;
85  map.info.height= height_new;
86  map.info.origin = origin_new;
87 
88  return a;
89 }
90 
95 void downsample (nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid& map)
96 {
97  // do not increase resolution
98  if (map.info.resolution >= resolution)
99  return;
100 
101  // reduction factor
102  int f = int(round(resolution / map.info.resolution));
103 
104  ROS_DEBUG("Downsample map by %d...", f);
105 
106  // downsample map data
107  vector<signed char> lr;
108  for (int i=0; i+f<map.info.height; i+=f) {
109  for (int j=0; j+f<map.info.width; j+=f) {
110  // count frequency of map data values
111  vector<unsigned int> values(256, 0);
112  for (int m=i; m<i+f; ++m) {
113  for (int n=j; n<j+f; ++n) {
114  values[map.data[m*map.info.width + n]]++;
115  }
116  }
117 
118  // choose value with highest frequency
119  unsigned char value = 0;
120  unsigned int freq = 0;
121  for (int k=0; k<values.size(); ++k) {
122  if (values[k] > freq) {
123  value = k;
124  freq = values[k];
125  }
126  }
127 
128  // push back most seen value
129  lr.push_back(value);
130  }
131  }
132  map.data = lr;
133 
134  // update meta data
135  map.info.map_load_time = Time::now();
136  map.info.resolution = resolution;
137  map.info.width = int(floor(double(map.info.width) / double(f)));
138  map.info.height = int(floor(double(map.info.height) / double(f)));
139 }
140 
146 bool generate_path (geometry_msgs::Point start)
147 {
148  // get area to cover
149  nav_msgs::GetMap gm;
150  if (map_getter.call(gm) == false){
151  ROS_ERROR("Failed to get the assigned map, cannot compute coverage path!");
152  return false;
153  }
154  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid map = gm.response.map;
155 
156  // divided area is already rotated, translated, and downsampled
157  double rotation = 0.0;
158  geometry_msgs::Vector3 translation;
159  if (divide_area) {
160  // get angle of rotation
161  cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble get_angle;
162  if (rotater.call(get_angle))
163  rotation = get_angle.response.value;
164 
165  // get translation vector
166  cpswarm_msgs::GetVector get_translation;
167  if (translater.call(get_translation))
168  translation = get_translation.response.vector;
169  }
170 
171  // original map still needs rotation and downsampling
172  else {
173  // rotate map
174  rotation = rotate(map);
175 
176  // downsample resolution
177  if (map.info.resolution < resolution) {
178  downsample(map);
179  }
180  }
181 
182  ROS_INFO("Generate new coverage path...");
183 
184  // construct minimum spanning tree
185  ROS_DEBUG("Construct minimum-spanning-tree...");
186  tree.initialize_graph(map, translation, rotation, vertical);
187  tree.construct();
188 
189  // visualize path
190  if (visualize)
191  mst_publisher.publish(tree.get_tree());
192 
193  // transform starting point
194  geometry_msgs::Point cps;
195  cps.x = (start.x + translation.x) * cos(rotation) - (start.y + translation.y) * sin(rotation);
196  cps.y = (start.x + translation.x) * sin(rotation) + (start.y + translation.y) * cos(rotation);
197 
198  // generate path
199  ROS_DEBUG("Generate coverage path...");
200  path.initialize_graph(map, translation, rotation);
201  path.initialize_tree(tree.get_mst_edges());
202  path.generate_path(cps);
203 
204  // visualize path
205  if (visualize)
206  path_publisher.publish(path.get_path());
207 
208  reconfigure = false;
209 
210  return true;
211 }
212 
219 bool get_path (nav_msgs::GetPlan::Request &req, nav_msgs::GetPlan::Response &res)
220 {
221  // compute new path if swarm configuration changed
222  if (reconfigure) {
223  if (generate_path(req.start.pose.position) == false)
224  return false;
225  }
226 
227  // return coverage path
228  res.plan = path.get_path();
229 
230  return true;
231 }
232 
239 bool get_waypoint (cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetWaypoint::Response &res)
240 {
241  // compute new path if swarm configuration changed
242  if (reconfigure) {
243  if (generate_path(req.position) == false)
244  return false;
245  }
246 
247  // return waypoint
248  res.point = path.get_waypoint(req.position, req.tolerance);
249  res.valid = path.valid();
250 
251  // visualize waypoint
252  if (visualize) {
253  geometry_msgs::PointStamped wp;
254  wp.header.stamp = Time::now();
255  wp.header.frame_id = "local_origin_ned";
256  wp.point = res.point;
257  wp_publisher.publish(wp);
258  }
259 
260  return true;
261 }
262 
267 void state_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::StateEvent::ConstPtr& msg)
268 {
269  // store new position and orientation in class variables
270  state = msg->state;
271 
272  // valid state received
273  if (msg->header.stamp.isValid())
274  state_valid = true;
275 }
276 
281 void swarm_callback (const cpswarm_msgs::ArrayOfStates::ConstPtr& msg)
282 {
283  // update cps uuids
284  for (auto cps : msg->states) {
285  // only consider cpss in the same state, i.e., coverage
286  if (cps.state != state)
287  continue;
288 
289  // index of cps in map
290  auto idx = swarm.find(cps.swarmio.node);
291 
292  // add new cps
293  if (idx == swarm.end()) {
294  swarm.emplace(cps.swarmio.node, Time::now());
295 
296  // recompute path
297  reconfigure = true;
298  ROS_DEBUG("New CPS %s", cps.swarmio.node.c_str());
299  }
300 
301  // update existing cps
302  else {
303  idx->second = Time::now();
304  }
305  }
306 
307  // remove old cps
308  for (auto cps=swarm.cbegin(); cps!=swarm.cend();) {
309  if (cps->second + Duration(swarm_timeout) < Time::now()) {
310  ROS_DEBUG("Remove CPS %s", cps->first.c_str());
311  swarm.erase(cps++);
312 
313  // recompute path
314  reconfigure = true;
315  }
316  else {
317  ++cps;
318  }
319  }
320 
321  swarm_valid = true;
322 }
323 
330 int main (int argc, char **argv)
331 {
332  // init ros node
333  init(argc, argv, "coverage_path");
334  NodeHandle nh;
335 
336  // init global variables
337  reconfigure = true;
338 
339  // read parameters
340  double loop_rate;
341  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 1.5);
342  int queue_size;
343  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
344  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
345  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/swarm_timeout", swarm_timeout, 5.0);
346  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/visualize", visualize, false);
347  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/divide_area", divide_area, false);
348  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/vertical", vertical, false);
349 
350  // initialize flags
351  state_valid = false;
352  swarm_valid = false;
353 
354  // publishers, subscribers, and service clients
355  Subscriber state_subscriber = nh.subscribe("state", queue_size, state_callback);
356  Subscriber swarm_subscriber = nh.subscribe("swarm_state", queue_size, swarm_callback);
357  if (visualize) {
358  path_publisher = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::Path>("coverage_path/path", queue_size, true);
359  wp_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("coverage_path/waypoint", queue_size, true);
360  mst_publisher = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseArray>("coverage_path/mst", queue_size, true);
361  }
362  if (divide_area) {
363  map_getter = nh.serviceClient<nav_msgs::GetMap>("area/assigned");
364  translater = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetVector>("area/get_translation");
365  translater.waitForExistence();
366  }
367  else
368  map_getter = nh.serviceClient<nav_msgs::GetMap>("area/get_map");
369  map_getter.waitForExistence();
370  rotater = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble>("area/get_rotation");
371  rotater.waitForExistence();
372 
373  // init loop rate
374  Rate rate(loop_rate);
375 
376  // init state
377  while (ok() && state_valid == false) {
378  ROS_DEBUG_ONCE("Waiting for valid state information...");
379  rate.sleep();
380  spinOnce();
381  }
382 
383  // init swarm
384  while (ok() && swarm_valid == false) {
385  ROS_DEBUG_ONCE("Waiting for valid swarm information...");
386  rate.sleep();
387  spinOnce();
388  }
389 
390  // provide coverage path services
391  ServiceServer path_service = nh.advertiseService("coverage_path/path", get_path);
392  ServiceServer wp_service = nh.advertiseService("coverage_path/waypoint", get_waypoint);
393  spin();
394 
395  return 0;
396 }
